entries.content: Hi, I am Marcin, game developer with 10+ years of combined experience in games, backend and medtech. I have strong background in real-time software and high-performance simulations with broad range of versatile technical skills and a proven ability to learn and adapt to complex systems.

projects.title: Enemy of the State
projects.role: Lead Game Programmer @ Brave Lamb Studio
projects.description: Enemy of the State is a co-op and single-player shooter set in the world of 1920s crime lords. You’re an aspiring mobster trying to reach the top during the Prohibition era. Gather your friends and perform heists all over the world. Will you build the most powerful crime syndicate in the world?

projects.title: War Hospital
projects.description: Be the ray of hope among the darkness of war. Control a British WW1 field hospital in a 3D isometric RTS where you lead the medical corps instead of soldiers. Fight for life, soul, and humanity in a world that rejected them in a unique society survival game.

projects.title: Nightwolf: Survive the Megadome
projects.description: Guns, cars, lasers and explosions! Synth themed, cyber powered vehicular combat game, where you play as a contender in world’s most popular sports arena – the MEGADOME.

projects.title: Fundamental Surgery
projects.description: Fundamental Surgery is a medical simulation platform, that combines both virtual reality environment and haptics (sense of touch) to provide real-time feedback on individual medical procedures. The main objective of Fundamental Surgery is to provide a safe, virtual environment where surgeons or other practitioners can perform and train and develop skills.

projects.title: Minerya
projects.description: Use your cunning, dangerous weapons and powerful boosters to become the richest miner in the galaxy.

projects.title: Floor Is Lava
projects.description: The room is a place where one must have a great imagination to hold out against boredom. Tiny platformer where you run away from rising lava, inspired by old classics like icy-tower

projects.title: Woodoku
projects.description: Woodoku is a mobile puzzle game blending Sudoku logic with Tetris-style block placement, designed for casual players across a broad age group.

projects.title: SPICEDERS2000
projects.description: Pixelart shooter inspired by 'DOOM' and 'The Thing', where you can either spot the enemy or fire blindly into the darkness, hoping to hit

projects.title: Springlade
projects.description: Adventure game prototype, created as a part of assignment for Game Dev School

projects.title: Asteroids
projects.description: Classic Arcade Game remade, created as a part of assignment for Game Dev School

projects.title: Human Wave
projects.description: Desperate attempt to escape from the torment of war

projects.title: Combat Medic
projects.description: Triage, prioritise and treat wounded soldiers in this simple game where each tick a heart beat is simulated

projects.title: Shopping Cart Lancelot
projects.description: Silly jousting game where you ride a shopping cart wielding a mop like a lance with a bucket over your head trying to defeat an equally absurd opponent while a cardboard audience cheers

projects.title: Boids
projects.description: A minimalist toy written in Rust where you chase elusive boids—catch them if you can, but they always try to escape—in a never-ending, zen-like pursuit with no goals or gameplay loop.

projects.title: Inversoids
projects.description: A chaotic twist on Asteroids where you spawn asteroids to smash incoming spaceships during their brief pause before they jump to hyperspace
